main.name: Jaydeep Mohite
main.description: I'm an experienced business application development professional with a demonstrated history of working in the investment banking industry.
main.bio: I'm an experienced Software Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the investment banking industry. I'm a strong business application development professional with a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) focused in Computer Engineering from College of Engineering, Pune.
main.contactmessage: Want to collaborate or hire me? Let's get in touch.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a Software Developer with almost 2 years of experience specializing in Web based application development. Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects. Having an in-depth knowledge including advanced Java, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JSON, XML, JQuery, Angular and React.

education.description: I have completed my Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Engineering with 8.2 CGPA from College of Engineering Pune.
I have completed my Diploma in Computer Engineering with overall 92.06% from Government Polytechnic Pune.

positions.title: Senior Analyst
positions.description: Part of dbPalace team in Market Finance under Enterprise Risk Technology, currently contributing in the development, enhancement and support of global PnL calculation system for Deutsche Bank.

positions.title: Analyst
positions.description: Part of Graduate Rotation programme, worked under Market Finance division. Developed Digital Planning Board and Server Analysis Tool during the rotation programme.

positions.title: Graduate Trainee
positions.description: Part of Deutsche Bank Global Graduate Programme 2017 held in London. Developed a micro-trade analysis app as part of the training programme.

positions.title: Project Intern
positions.description: Part of the development team at ChooseToThinq, developed an AI based chat bot using api.ai in the field of learning as part of B.Tech.Project.

positions.title: Summer Intern
positions.description: Part of development team under Corporate Business Technologies. Developed a AngularJS, Spring Boot and MongoDB based web application for Project/Resource management.

positions.title: Project Lead
positions.description: Managed a team of developers and content writers. Delivered the revamped COEP website using Drupal framework.

positions.title: Project Intern
positions.description: Part of the development team at COEP WebTeam. Developed and managed COEP website and other services hosted on internal servers.

testimonials.text: Jaydeep is the heart of the web-team project and excels at web development especially HTML, CSS, JS and development in the Drupal Framework. His other strengths include managing people and resources. He is a true workaholic and leads by example. He played a pivotal role in the development of College of Engineering Pune's new responsive website. He will bring great value to any team that he works in due to his affable nature, strong programming and communication skills.
testimonials.user: Udit Mehta - Incoming Software Engineer at Microsoft | Graduate Teaching Assistant at UC San Diego
